mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER WHERE U_REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff'))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER WHERE (U_REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff')) AND (U_ID = #{searchDTO.id}) UNION SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER WHERE U_REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND U_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchDTO.keyword} || '%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT M.U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, M.U_ID, M.POST_TYPE_ID, M.U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, M.U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, M.U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, M.COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, M.COMMUNITY_VIEW_CNT, M.COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM MEMBER_COMMUNITY M LEFT OUTER JOIN POST_TYPE P ON M.POST_TYPE_ID = P.POST_TYPE_ID WHERE U_ID = #{uId})
